title: Nameless Demon of Vengeance
desc:
*If you want something right, do it yourself.*

The Boss has returned with a vengeful grudge against you. Not only that, but the more times you defeat this enemy, the stronger it becomes.

Killing it will award you with a +200 bonus point Crown. However, each Crown in your inventory will add an extra +100% extra damage to every future Demon encounter.

This monster is immune to Scrolls and the Stun effect.
